+#![deny(overflowing_literals)]
+
+fn main() {
+    const XYZ: char = 0x1F888 as char;
+    //~^ ERROR only u8 can be casted into char
+    const XY: char = 129160 as char;
+    //~^ ERROR only u8 can be casted into char
+    const ZYX: char = '\u{01F888}';
+    println!("{}", XYZ);
+}
